response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unmatched benefits, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $1,100,000. This is an unprecedented chance to secure such a valuable asset at a discount, ensuring a significant return on investment. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together to elevate your business or personal endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. Sincerely, Alice.", "product_price": 1100000}
